skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
skills.name: Snicker and Slice
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10% on each critical hit. Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Night of the Bat
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP on each critical hit.
skills.name: Swarming Suffering
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Steals 15% of the Turn Meter from the enemy with the highest Turn Meter at the end of this Champion’s turn. This effect cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Gimme! [P]
